Package tellolib.camera

Class TelloCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • tellolib.camera.TelloCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TelloCameraInterface
    public class TelloCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements TelloCameraInterface
    Convenience functions for Tello camera.

      • startVideoCapture

        public void startVideoCapture​(boolean liveWindow)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Start thread to capture video stream from drone for processing by this program. This function may take several seconds to complete. Thread will set drone connection state to disconnected if it detects the stream has stopped.
        Specified by:
        startVideoCapture in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        liveWindow - True to display video feed in a live window.

      • stopVideoCapture

        public void stopVideoCapture()
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Stop video stream capture thread.
        Specified by:
        stopVideoCapture in interface TelloCameraInterface

      • takePicture

        public boolean takePicture​(java.lang.String folder)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Save the current image from the video feed to a file in the named folder.
        Specified by:
        takePicture in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        folder - Location to save image.
        Returns:
        True if image saved, false if failed.

        public boolean startRecording​(java.lang.String folder)

        Specified by:

      • addTarget

        public void addTarget​(org.opencv.core.Rect target)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Add a target rectangle to be drawn on the camera feed images. Width of lines defaults to 1 pixel, color defaults to 0,0,255 (red).
        Specified by:
        addTarget in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        target - Rectangle to draw, null to clear all rectangles.

      • addTarget

        public void addTarget​(org.opencv.core.Rect target,
                      int width,
                      org.opencv.core.Scalar color)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Add a target rectangle to be drawn on the camera feed images.
        Specified by:
        addTarget in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        target - Rectangle to draw, null to clear all rectangles.
        width - Pixel width of rectangle lines.
        color - Set the line color used to draw rectangles. B,G,R color values.

      • setContours

        public void setContours​(java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> contours)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Set an array of MatOfPoint vectors, one vector for each contour to be drawn on the camera feed images. Each vector can contains as many points as needed to draw the contour.
        Specified by:
        setContours in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        contours - Array of MatOfPoint objects, one for each contour, null to clear all contours.

      • setContours

        public void setContours​(java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> contours,
                        int width,
                        org.opencv.core.Scalar color)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Set an array of MatOfPoint vectors, one vector for each contour to be drawn on the camera feed images. Each vector can contains as many points as needed to draw the contour.
        Specified by:
        setContours in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        contours - Array of MatOfPoint objects, one for each contour, null to clear all contours.
        width - Pixel width of rectangle lines.
        color - Set the line color used to draw rectangles. B,G,R color values.

        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface

        Specified by:

      • setStatusBar

        public void setStatusBar​(java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> method)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Sets a method that will be called in the video stream processing loop to automatically set status area at the bottom of the video feed.
        Specified by:
        setStatusBar in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        method - A method that returns the string to be displayed.

      • setVideoFrameSize

        public void setVideoFrameSize​(int width,
                              int height)
        Description copied from interface: TelloCameraInterface
        Sets the starting video frame size for live window, pictures and recorded video. Must be called before startVideoCapture(). Resizing live window will change the video frame size.
        Specified by:
        setVideoFrameSize in interface TelloCameraInterface
        Parameters:
        width - Width of frame in pixels.
        height - Height of frame in pixels.
